text.name: Asymmetrical Inertia
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (highest Reson.) [Vibration] Count (max 6, 20 per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger [Switch_Vibration] on [Vibration] on self into [VibrationSpring]
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
- When triggering [Vibration] Burst, inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a 4+ Sloth A-Reson., inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] next turn as well

text.name: Asymmetrical Inertia
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (<style="highlight">2 + highest Reson.) [Vibration] Count (max <style="highlight">8, 20 per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger [Switch_Vibration] on [Vibration] on self into [VibrationSpring]
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
- When triggering [Vibration] Burst, inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a <style="highlight">Sloth A-Reson., inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] next turn as well

text.name: Asymmetrical Inertia
text.desc:
[BeforeAttack] Gain (<style="highlight">4 + highest Reson.) [Vibration] Count (max 8, 20 per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger [Switch_Vibration] on [Vibration] on self into [VibrationSpring]
coinDescs:
[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
- When triggering [Vibration] Burst, inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a <style="highlight">3+ Sloth Reson., inflict 1 [AmberTakeDamageUp] next turn as well

passiveList.name: Broken Bell
passiveList.desc:
Inflict [Vulnerable] this turn on enemies who were hit by [VibrationExplosion] from Skill, Coin, or Passive effects.
- Does not stack with E.G.O Gifts that inflict [Vulnerable] upon triggering Tremor Burst. (If the said E.G.O Gifts have been enhanced, subtract this effect's value from the final value before inflicting it.)

text.name: Asymmetrical Inertia
text.desc:
[CantIdentify]
Targets randomly
[BeforeAttack] Gain (2 + highest Reson.) [Vibration] Count (max 8, 20 per turn)
- If the said Reson. was a Sloth Reson., trigger [Switch_Vibration] on [Vibration] on self into [VibrationSpring]
coinDescs: [OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1

[OnSucceedAttack] Trigger [VibrationExplosion]; then, reduce target's [Vibration] Count by 1
- When triggering [Vibration] Burst, inflict 2 [AmberTakeDamageUp] this turn
- If the highest Reson. was a 4+ Sloth A-Reson, inflict 2 [AmberTakeDamageUp] next turn as well
